description: Version 3 of the Internal Waters from the VLIZ Maritime Boundaries Geodatabase. Internal Waters are the waters on the landward side of the baseline of a nation's territorial waters, except in archipelagic states. It includes waterways such as rivers and canals, and sometimes the water within small bays.
keywords: territorial seas, contiguous zone, marine regions, World Oceans, marine, exclusive economic zones, law of the sea, territorial waters, world oceans, archipelagic waters, internal waters, boundaries, Administrative units
name: Internal Waters (v3, world, 2019)
